Show that you serve no master with the Neoni modification for the Fortifier helmet. Drawing inspiration from the myths of old, this menacing variant of the Kastak Arms Fortifier features a devilish paint job, fang-filled grin, and pointed horns. Providing protection and intimidation in one memorable helmet.
